ygData.subject: Lute of The Gypsy Princess
ygData.msgSnippet: Deleted the email this thread was on but I would like to point something out. I highly doubt the Lute has a magical effect. It was used in a quest before and
ygData.messageBody:
Deleted the email this thread was on but I would like to point something out. I highly doubt the
Lute has a magical effect. It was used in a quest before and unless it changes will be again as of
Tomorrow.

I know verant does some dumb things.. but who would really trade the Lute (which is hard to get) if
it had such high magic properties for some above average armor?

Ranian Aeleroth
Bard of the Rathe
